hudson.model.TextParameterValue.name: RELEASENOTE
hudson.model.TextParameterValue.description: リリースノートです（appcenterに表示します）

com.cwctravel.hudson.plugins.extended__c.name: UNITY_VERSION
com.cwctravel.hudson.plugins.extended__c.description: ビルドに利用するUnityのバージョンです

com.cwctravel.hudson.plugins.extended__c.name: BUILD_KIND
com.cwctravel.hudson.plugins.extended__c.description: クライアントのビルド種別

hudson.model.BooleanParameterValue.name: needCleanWorkspace
hudson.model.BooleanParameterValue.description: ワークスペースのクリーン

hudson.model.BooleanParameterValue.name: CLEAR_CACHE
hudson.model.BooleanParameterValue.description: Libraryフォルダーを削除してビルド（注意：ビルド時間が１時間ほど増えます。）

hudson.model.StringParameterValue.name: APPCENTER_API_TOKEN
hudson.model.StringParameterValue.description: AppCenter API TOKENを指定します（伏せ字にできるならしたほうがよいかもしれないが、パラメーター指定でみれそうなので・・・どうだろ）

org.jenkinsci.plugins.pipeline.modeldefi.name: ワークスペースのクリーン

org.jenkinsci.plugins.pipeline.modeldefi.value:
StringBuilder commandBuilder = new StringBuilder() commandBuilder.append "$UNITY_PATH" commandBuilder.append " -projectPath $WORKSPACE" commandBuilder.append " -quit -batchmode" commandBuilder.append " -executeMethod $ADDRESSABLE_METHOD" commandBuilder.append " -logFile ${WORKSPACE}/Logs/assetbuild_${BUILD_ID}_log.txt" commandBuilder.append " -buildTarget $BUILD_TARGET" commandBuilder.append " -assetProfile $ASSET_PROFILE"
sh(script:commandBuilder.toString(), returnStdout:false)

StringBuilder commandBuilder = new StringBuilder() commandBuilder.append "$UNITY_PATH" commandBuilder.append " -projectPath $WORKSPACE" commandBuilder.append " -quit -batchmode" commandBuilder.append " -executeMethod $UNITY_METHOD" commandBuilder.append " -logFile ${WORKSPACE}/Logs/build_${BUILD_ID}_log.txt" commandBuilder.append " -buildTarget $BUILD_TARGET" commandBuilder.append " -BuildNumber $BUILD_ID" commandBuilder.append " -OutputPath $OUTPUT_PATH" commandBuilder.append " -buildKind ${params.BUILD_KIND}"
sh(script:commandBuilder.toString(), returnStdout:false)

def archiveDir = APP_OUTPUT_PATH.replace("/${IPA_EXECUTABLE_NAME}.ipa", "") versionName = versionInfomationUtility.getVersionName('ios', archiveDir, IPA_EXECUTABLE_NAME) VERSION = versionName.replace("\n", '') println 'ipa versionName:' + VERSION

wrap([$class: 'BuildUser']) { APP_NAME = appcenterUtility.getAppCenterAppName("ios", params.BUILD_KIND) BUILDER = env.BUILD_USER_ID // TODO:Upsteram jobは後で変更必要 println 'appcenterへのアップロード' build job: 'Upload_AppCenter', parameters: [ string(name: 'APPCENTER_API_TOKEN', value: params.APPCENTER_API_TOKEN), string(name: 'APP_NAME', value: APP_NAME), string(name: 'OUTPUT_DIR', value: "$OUTPUT_PATH/Export/Apps"), string(name: 'copyArtifacts_ProjectName', value: 'DevBuild_iOS_Single'), string(name: 'target_filter_artifact', value: ''), string(name: 'upstream_build_number', value: env.BUILD_NUMBER), string(name: 'upstream_build_user', value: BUILDER), string(name: 'APP_FILENAME', value: "${IPA_FILENAME}.ipa"), string(name: 'DISTRIBUTION_GROUPS', value: appcenterUtility.getAppCenterDistributionGroups()), text(name: 'RELEASENOTE', value: params.RELEASENOTE)] }
RELEASE_ID = appcenterUtility.getReleaseId(env.APPCENTER_OWNER, APP_NAME, params.APPCENTER_API_TOKEN) println "appcenter ReleaseID:${RELEASE_ID}"

flow-build.description: ビルド種別：Dev アセット種別：Release ブランチ：master GITLOG：Author:shin donggun Message:update proto ( master ) Date:2022/06/17 16:09:08
